txt.en: Elrohir is worried about the news Gwaihir brought regarding the wolves along the Anduin.\n\nYou should talk to Elrohir at Echad Andestel in Lothlórien to continue your journey.
'It is just as we feared: scouts have reported many sightings of Wargs close to the northern border.'
04. The Further Adventures of Elladan & Elrohir, Chapter 4

'I have been dwelling on the news Gwaihir brought us, about the wolf presence along the Anduin. The Galadhrim here have assured me that no wolves have been spotted, but that may change the deeper we venture into the woods.\n\n'Don't let your guard down on our way to Caras Galadhon. I fear more trouble may be lurking just around the corner.'
Though you have almost reached your destination, danger may still lurk nearby.
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
Complete 'Mission: The Further Adventures of Elladan & Elrohir, Chapter 4'
Your party has discovered a possible Warg presence in Lothlórien.\n\nYou should talk to Elladan to see what the twins plan to do next.
